content.raw:
The collision shapes show up as orange, they become more evident if you also choose view -> transparent. I can see the collisions on the fingers are matching the visuals, which means you're not using Steve's URDF.

The collisions on the fingers should look like this: https://gitlab.com/nasa-jsc-robotics/val_description/merge_requests/19
